attributes.action: ensure that HM Revenue & Customs reply to taxpayers' correspondence within a short period of time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an unreasonable delay (10 to 14 weeks) for HMRC to answer correspondence by taxpayers, letters of complaint sent by recorded delivery are not even acknowledged by Customer Relations Manager!  Taxpayers' rights should be respected by HMRC.
